content: introducing the ombré fair isle beanie featuring lightly cascading stitches falling into a ribbed hem this ombré fade effect creates a stylish and sophisticated take on the traditional fair isle style the dense yet flexible stitches ensure that your head will stay cosy and snug all winter long this beanie is worked from the bottom up and then in a spiral so the beanie is seamless and the stitches line up perfectly this pattern is accompanied by a video tutorial and colour chart slightly_smiling_face sizes toddler child adult skill level easy/intermediate check out more free crochet patterns here 1 sign up to my ** newsletter 2 ** and never miss a new crochet pattern release 1 https //forthefrills com 2 https //view flodesk com/pages/5ebf67c2ab499000265d1ad4
